basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus, Staphylococcus aureus, Peptostreptococcus micros, Pediococcus acidilactici, Clostridium sporogenes, Corynebacterium diphtheriae, Actinomyces viscosus, Gardnerella vaginalis, Propionibacterium acnes, Listeria monocytogenes, Mycobacterium smegmatis.Gram-negative bacteria:Campylobacter jejuni, Helicobacter pylori, Neisseria gonorrhoeae.
